notes: irregular past participle 'vissuto'; used with auxiliary avere

example_sentence_english: I used to live in the countryside.

translation_english: he used to live/she used to live/you (formal) used to live
example_sentence_english: She used to live in the city.
They used to live in the suburbs.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'vissuto'
example_sentence_english: I have had a unique experience.

translation_english: he has lived/she has lived/you (formal) have lived
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'

example_sentence_english: They have lived here for years.
